applet.name: CustomClock
applet.changes: - various fixes and lms imageproxy support
applet.creator: erland, tcutting, urknall
applet.title: CustomClock
applet.desc: A screensaver for Squeezebox Controller/Touch/Radio devices that shows a clock. It is possible to select among a number of different styles and you can configure what kind of date/time information you like to show.

applet.name: JLCustomClock
applet.title: CustomClock for Jivelite
applet.creator: erland, tcutting, urknall
applet.changes: - various fixes and lms imageproxy support
